metadata.title: CVE-2018-4200 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.3.1 isaffected. Safari before 11.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.5 on Windows isaffected. iTunes before 12.7.5 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11.4 isaffected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memorycorruption and application crash) via a crafted web site that triggers aWebCore::jsElementScrollHeightGetter use-after-free.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
